channel.title: Gitlab on Efficient-git
channel.description: Recent content in Gitlab on Efficient-git

item.title: Organization
item.description: Naming rules Simple rules to name groups, subgroups or repositories : Letters are in lowercase No whitespace. Use dash (-) instead No special characters Folders Overview Existing folders : /project/ contains repositories for projects /doc/ contains repositories for documentations /templates/ contains repositories for starter kits or configurations /library/ contains repositories for reusable libraries Projects Projects are applications. The path for projects is of the form /project///// Documentations Documentations are written in Markdown and built as a website with Hugo.
